Represents the database context for the National Microchip Registry.

public class RegistryDbContext : DbContext, IInfrastructure<IServiceProvider>, IDbContextDependencies, IDbSetCache, IDbContextPoolable, IResettableService, IDisposable, IAsyncDisposable
